data.title: Apple’s New iPad Pro Should Turn Device Into True Laptop Replacement
data.meta_description: New iPads are due to arrive on Tuesday, and Apple should go all-in on making them into true laptop replacements. Also: Peloton’s CEO finally calls it quits, and AI becomes the hot topic at Apple’s earnings announcement.
data.text:
New iPads are due to arrive on Tuesday, and Apple should go all-in on making them into true laptop replacements. Also: Peloton’s CEO finally calls it quits, and AI becomes the hot topic at Apple’s earnings announcement.

Last week in Power On: Apple rivals retool to better compete with the iPhone and Vision Pro.
